Module JBubbleBobble
Package game.model.powerups

Class Powerup

java.lang.Object
game.model.entities.Entity
game.model.powerups.Powerup
Direct Known Subclasses:
AmethystRing, BlueCandy, Clock, CrystalRing, Dynamite, Parasol, PinkCandy, RubyRing, Shoes, YellowCandy
public abstract class Powerup extends Entity
The Powerup class represents a power-up entity in the game. This abstract class handles common functionalities such as checking collisions with the player, applying effects, and managing the duration of the power-up.

  • Constructor Details

    • Powerup

      public Powerup(float x, float y, char code, int points, long duration)
      Constructs a new Powerup with the specified position, code, points, and duration.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the power-up.
      y - the y-coordinate of the power-up.
      code - the character code representing the power-up.
      points - the points awarded to the player upon collecting the power-up.
      duration - the duration for which the power-up effect lasts.

      Returns whether this power-up is marked for removal.
